about_the_game:
FireAlpaca SE is the exclusive paint software to Windows / Mac operating system that is widely suitable for beginners to advanced users.
We removed all the advertisements from FireAlpaca freeware version, that enables the faster performance and more stable environment.

The special features that only FireAlpaca SE has are:
  • Switchable 2 interface colors (Dark/Right)
  • Liquify tool
  • Layer Mask
  • Special Brushes (Available for download from the brush store)
  • No advertisement
  • Only buy outright
  • No subscription
  • Automatic update to an improved version
More unique features will be implemented to FireAlpaca SE for the future development.

The distinctive features of FireAlpaca are:
  • Timelapse*
  • Brush script function (programmable brush processing)
  • 1 bit / 8 bit layer (can reduce memory consumption)
  • Onion skin function (allows to create simple animations)
  • Materials window (work can be done while displaying materials)
  • Snap function (easy to draw parallel lines, curves, ellipses, saturated lines, etc.)
  • Smooth brush processing compatible with Wintab tablets
*Below is a timelapse image.
You can follow the trajectory of your creation.


Rich features include:
  • Layer function (18 kinds of blend modes, clipping, layer folder)
  • Selection function (rectangle, lasso, selection pen, etc.)
  • Transformation and free transformation of the selection area (choose 3 types of image quality)
  • Brush processing such as watercolor, scatter watercolor, bitmap, pattern, etc.
  • Re-editable text function
  • Filters such as level correction, hue, Gaussian blur, and cloud patterns

name: FireAlpaca SE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: FireAlpaca SE is painting software for Windows/Mac that has evolved as a higher brand of the regular version of FireAlpaca. We provide a professional creative environment where your creativity can be visualized immediately.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
